basic_info.description:
In Todays Dynamic Digital Disruption era, early Adaption to the Digital Technology & Trends is the Key to achieve competetive advantage.
At CoE -DX we pioneer in indepth understanding of the Adobe Exp Cloud Technologies.
Having establised a CoE at an Automotive OEMs with a core objective  of Upskilling Digital Literacy across Marketing Funnel Business Units and also  enabling early adaption and competencies towards Adobe Exp Cloud Technologies & Trends.
During our Interaction with Business Leaders across Globe, it was clear that the Digital Initiative decisions needs more practical led Information and the ROI often cannot be achieved as planned. 
The main reason is the confidence in the Present Digital Technologies, Core Tech skills and End to End Digital Literacy.
It is always lessons learned hard way to the Business Leaders having taken Bold Digital Initiatives.
We at CoE DX, can guide you make Informed decisions and achieve the Planned Objectives. In the duly course, we shall also Upskill the Team to be self sufficient and Independant.
